thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: DIANA
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by DIANA

author: DIANA
title: DIANA
text: We rented a car for one week while at palm cove. The rental procedure was easy enough, we where offered an upgrade to a larger vehicle and took the option for a fee. I requested a GPS unit and the assistant advised we could use our phones to log into the onboard car screen with ease. This was not as easy as described especially when I was told there is a cable to do so. We just used our phones. On returning the vehicle there was no signage indicating the redspot designated zones, they only have poorly spray painted parking bays, a competitors assistant advised us where to look. Other than that drop off was quick and easy.
